about.title: About Cemcon Group Pvt. Ltd.
about.body:
A captive unit of the Indian Railways, Cemcon group is a manufacturer and supplier of railway components. Been established in 1991, Cemcon group has emerged as a leading group of companies dealing in/with railway rubber parts,fabricated components, manufacturers, exporters, wholesalers and suppliers.

Approved by Research Design & Standard Organisation, Lucknow (India), we are steadily manufacturing and supplying the mechanical & track safety products to Indian Railways.

future.title: Vision
future.body: We see ourselves, establishing a Joint Manufacturing Base in India and overseas to serve Domestic as well as international market.

future.title: Mision
future.body: Our company aims at improving productivity, achieving zero defects and meeting just-in-time supply requirements of not only the Indian Railways but also, the private railway siding markets to cater to the exacting standards.

future.title: Values
future.body: From our very inception, ensuring quality and reliability have always been the main objectives of our company. We work with integrity and are moving towards sustainable mobility.
